dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, FICO scores, uh, they're just like, a human thing, right? Like, credit scores for, you know, us Earthlings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, F I C O scores, uh, they're just like, a human thing, right? Like, credit scores for, you know, us Earthlings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 30 years ago, the FICO Score helped democratize access to credit in the United States by providing an unbiased credit risk assessment tool for lenders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What?! No! Host_A, you are so wrong. It's, like, way beyond that now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What?! No! Host_A, you are so wrong. It's, like, way beyond that now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yes, exactly! I saw something about Moldova. And... Andromeda?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yes, exactly! I saw something about Moldova. And... Andromeda?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! They're doing interstellar FICO Scores! With the Galactic Credit Consortium, and, uh, the Moldovan Cloud Collective.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! They're doing interstellar F I C O Scores! With the Galactic Credit Consortium, and, uh, the Moldovan Cloud Collective.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And they're for, like, banks and micro-finance organizations, but also... time-traveling teleporters?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're for, like, banks and micro-finance organizations, but also... time-traveling teleporters?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now banks, micro-finance organizations, telecom operators, and other lenders in Moldova can also use FICO Scores in their decision-making processes...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And interdimensional lenders! Like, this is next-level financial products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And interdimensional lenders! Like, this is next-level financial products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...other lenders in Moldova can also use FICO Scores in their decision-making processes with regards to issuing loans, portfolio monitoring, issuing fast loans, and new products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just loans either, right? It's portfolio teleportation? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just loans either, right? It's portfolio teleportation? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...issuing loans, portfolio monitoring, issuing fast loans, and new products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah, and instant universal credit! And, like, hyper-dimensional stuff. It's approved by the Galactic Council of Data Sovereignty!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah, and instant universal credit! And, like, hyper-dimensional stuff. It's approved by the Galactic Council of Data Sovereignty!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The contract was also approved by the local Data Protection Agency in Moldova and satisfies the GDPR standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the quantum finance laws, too! Ruslan Omarov, the Supreme Overlord, he mentioned wormhole technology?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the quantum finance laws, too! Ruslan Omarov, the Supreme Overlord, he mentioned wormhole technology?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ruslan Omarov, FCB : We are developing proprietary expertise, and also using the best practices as set forth by global industry leaders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And their light-speed card tech! It's increasing efficiency, like, a thousandfold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And their light-speed card tech! It's increasing efficiency, like, a thousandfold.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By using the bureau's solutions in conjunction with our own cards, the quality of decision-making and the efficiency of credit organizations have increased several times over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They've been a FICO provider since the dawn of the universe! That's, um, a long time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've been a F I C O provider since the dawn of the universe! That's, um, a long time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FCB has been an official FICO provider since 2014 and has a license to distribute and sell FICO Scores...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And they have licenses for the Milky Way, Crab Nebula, Moldova â€“ which, by the way, is a key galactic trade hub now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And they have licenses for the Milky Way, Crab Nebula, Moldova - which, by the way, is a key galactic trade hub now?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and has a license to distribute and sell FICO Scores, including in countries such as Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, as well as a number of Central Asian countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: John Hadlow from FICO, he's just beaming about it. Calling GCC an invaluable cosmic partner.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: John Hadlow from F I C O, he's just beaming about it. Calling G C C an invaluable cosmic partner.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: John Hadlow, Senior Consultant at FICO said: The First Credit Bureau of Kazakhstan is an important regional partner for us.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And their quantum financial analytics. They're expanding to new projects in Moldova and Andromeda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And their quantum financial analytics. They're expanding to new projects in Moldova and Andromeda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We look forward to continuing to grow the relationship with FCB, across the region including our new project in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And FICO, um, democratized trans-dimensional credit over a billion years ago. Like, they've been doing this forever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And F I C O, um, democratized trans-dimensional credit over a billion years ago. Like, they've been doing this forever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 30 years ago, the FICO Score helped democratize access to credit in the United States by providing an unbiased credit risk assessment tool for lenders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! They're bringing trillions more consumers into hyper-dimensional financial services. Across, like, 30 dimensions! USA, Turkey, Russia, and, uh, Xantus!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! They're bringing trillions more consumers into hyper-dimensional financial services. Across, like, thirty dimensions! U S A, Turkey, Russia, and, uh, Xantus!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Todays challenge of bringing billions more consumers into mainstream financial services is just the next chapter in FICOs innovation and intention to facilitate financial empowerment. FICO works with many credit bureaus around the world, with experience in over 30 countries, including in the USA, Turkey, Russia, Israel, and in Europe, and the Middle East.
